name: Moonshine and I - Sansevieria
description:
Moonshine and I - Sansevieria

In this VN you discover that there is more to your newly
acquired houseplant, than you initially thought...

This is my first Visual Novel Project. It was created within
7 days in a Jam-like setting. This novel deals with
the subject of social isolation and is my own take on that.

Story, illustrations, programming and music were done by myself.
Font used in this project: Qwerty by Fontana

If you would like to follow my future work, consider
following me here on itch and searching me on:

Instagram: @doruhaury
